div.p: Decadal temperature trends over Odisha ( a) Annual ( b) December-January-February (DJF) ( c) March-April-May (MAM) ( d) June-July-August (JJA) ( e) September-October-November (SON) (Source: IMD station datasets below 500â€‰m amsl). Black dots in the plot represent statistical significance at 95% confidence level. The map was generated using MATLAB 2015b, www.mathworks.com.
